title: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank turns around with Rs 127 crore net profit in Q4 - Economic Times
content: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank turns around with Rs 127 crore net profit in Q4  Economic Times
description: The net interest margin of the lender improved to 10.1% in the fourth quarter against 7.9% in the year-ago period. Net interest income for the quarter stood 48% higher at Rs 544 crore against Rs 368 crore. Operating profit rose 40% to Rs 217 crore against Rs 155 crore in the same period.
